90 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Scott,
Hope you are doing well. Just wanted to follow up and see if you still planned on using and MBO and if you have any questions for me. Please let me know when you have a moment.
Thank you, Sara
